Topic.Title: FYI - Flood of guests? Ready Player One reference.

Posts.EditableText:
I’ll put the spoilers in the details...

I’m in the middle of reading Ready Player One, which is really good so far, but I got WAAAY too excited when I got to the end of Chapter 22.

Don’t read the details below unless you you want to see a mild spoiler about the book/movie!
<details>The main character has just found out that he has to go interact with Zork I.  I’m definitely excited to go watch the movie now.  I hope they go through the entire house!  I want to see Hollywood’s version of it!</details>
Posts.HTML:
I’ll put the spoilers in the details...

I’m in the middle of reading Ready Player One, which is really good so far, but I got WAAAY too excited when I got to the end of Chapter 22.

Don’t read the details below unless you you want to see a mild spoiler about the book/movie!

The main character has just found out that he has to go interact with Zork I. I’m definitely excited to go watch the movie now. I hope they go through the entire house! I want to see Hollywood’s version of it!

Posts.EditableText: I loved that part too, but just to warn you, I've seen the movie, and it does not follow the book too well. It still is an amazing movie on it's own, I still absolutely loved it. I am also making a RPO game atm!
Posts.HTML: I loved that part too, but just to warn you, I've seen the movie, and it does not follow the book too well. It still is an amazing movie on it's own, I still absolutely loved it. I am also making a RPO game atm!

Posts.EditableText: Loved that book! Think I'll reread it once or twice before watching the movie.
